key_risks: Regulatory scrutiny and compliance risks related to AML and CTF
Heavy reliance on the U.S.-to-Latin America corridor, exposing the company to regional economic and political risks
Intense competition from traditional players and fintech disruptors
Fraud and cybersecurity risks impacting customer trust and operations
controversies: Legal disputes related to equity compensation agreements
Potential reputational risks from regulatory non-compliance
social_issues: Ensuring customer trust and satisfaction in underserved regions
Addressing fraud and cybersecurity risks to protect customers
governance_issues: Strengthening AML and KYC protocols to meet stricter regulatory requirements
Managing legal disputes and potential reputational risks
